Name: Property
About the game: Property is a first person horror online game. Group of people have entered to an restricted area where they meet something unexpected. Gameplay 1 player is randomly chosen to be a killer and all others as survivors, survivors must escape the area before the killer finds them. Environments 6 Different maps you can choose to play. All of them are randomly generated every time so nobody can learn the layout before the game. Online Hosting - online or lan matches - passworded - max players up to 10 - host specific map or let the game choose random levels - play against AI while waiting online players Searching other games - automatic game finder - server list for finding games Controls Keyboard and mouse, or controller + invert settings
Meta Title: Property: Feb 2, 2018, Kimi Karri and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Property? Check out the release date (Feb 2, 2018), developer insights from Kimi Karri, and a complete game summary.
